 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוא‎</span>] **verb** ==hinder, restrain, frustrate== (Arabic (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (or <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) ***rise with difficulty, rise against one*** ([[BDB#Frey|Frey]]), III. ***contend with***, [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]<sup>2861</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תנואון‎</span> [[Num.32.7|Num 32:7]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]], but read Hiph\`il (so [[BDB#Qr|Qr]]), compare [[BDB#Di|Di]]. **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵנִיא‎</span> [[Num.30.6|Num 30:6]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָנִיא‎</span> v.[[Num.30.9|Num 30:9]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָנִי‎</span> [[Ps.141.5|Ps 141:5]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּנִיאוּן‎</span> [[Num.32.7|Num 32:7]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]]; — 

**1.** ***restrain, forbid*** (performance of vow), followed by accusative of person [[Num.30.6|Num 30:6]] (twice in verse); [[Num.30.9|Num 30:9]]; [[Num.30.12|Num 30:12]] ***frustrate*** (device of people), subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, followed by accusative of thing, [[Ps.33.10|Ps 33:10]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵפִיר‎</span>); ***refuse*** [[Ps.141.5|Ps 141:5]] ((text dubious see [[BDB#Che|Che]]). 

**2.** ***restrain, make averse*** the heart (accusative) [[Num.32.7|Num 32:7]] (followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעֲבֹר‎</span>), v[[Num.32.9|Num 32:9]] (followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְבִלְתִּיבֿאֹ‎</span>).
